thread.title: Ray at Promotional Mojo
thread.title_full: DiscountMugs reviewed by Ray at Promotional Mojo

author: Ray at Promotional Mojo
title: Ray at Promotional Mojo
text: I had a tight deadline and with a couple of issues with logo, Carmen and the staff at Discount mugs helped me with solutions instead of just saying we can't. Will continue to use them as they have quality products and the best customer service. I would rate them higher than 5 stars if I could.
